original: @78b * // klu gtor rgyas pa ni /
analyzed: @78b * // klu gtor rgyas pa ni /
translated: The extensive naga torma:

original: rin po che'i snod mdzes pa'i nang du 'bru sna tshogs dang / klu sman sna tshogs dang / zan la sogs pa'i phung po stsal la /🔽zan la sogs pa'i phung po la bam las rin po che sna lnga las grub pa'i snod /
analyzed: rin po che'i snod mdzes pa'i nang du 'bru sna tshogs dang / klu sman sna tshogs dang / zan la sogs pa'i phung po stsal la / zan la sogs pa'i phung po la bam las rin po che sna lnga las grub pa'i snod /
translated: In a beautiful precious vessel, place heaps of various grains, various naga medicines, and dough.

original: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
translated: From A comes a moon mandala.

original: de'i steng du pam las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho /
analyzed: de'i steng du pam las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho /
translated: On top of that, from PAM comes an ocean of nectar.

original: de'i steng du hr'i:las 'od 'phros pas bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho dang 'o ma'i rgya mtsho kha dog dkar zhing ro mchog brgyad dang ldan pa dri zhim pa bsam /
analyzed: de'i steng du hr'i:las 'od 'phros pas bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho dang 'o ma'i rgya mtsho kha dog dkar zhing ro mchog brgyad dang ldan pa dri zhim pa bsam /
translated: On top of that, from HRIH light radiates out, and the ocean of nectar and the ocean of milk become white in color and have the eight excellent tastes and a sweet smell.

original: aom las sman gyi sdong po stong gsum gang ba /
analyzed: aom las sman gyi sdong po stong gsum gang ba /
translated: From OM comes a medicine tree filling the three-thousandfold world systems.

original: sva las autpala gyi nags tshal me tog gi tshal chags pa bsam gyis mi khyab par bsam /
analyzed: sva las autpala gyi nags tshal me tog gi tshal chags pa bsam gyis mi khyab par bsam /
translated: From SVAM comes an inconceivable forest of utpalas and a grove of flowers.

original: tam las dpag bsam gyi shing 'o ma dad bum pa dpag tu med pa 'bab pa bskyed la /
analyzed: tam las dpag bsam gyi shing 'o ma dad bum pa dpag tu med pa 'bab pa bskyed la /
translated: From TAM comes a wish-fulfilling tree, from which an immeasurable stream of milk flows.

original: bdag lha'i rnal 'byor du gnas pa'i snying ga'i yi ge las 'od 'phros pas /🔽klu rigs thams cad sbrul mgo bdun pa la sogs pa'am /
analyzed: bdag lha'i rnal 'byor du gnas pa'i snying ga'i yi ge las 'od 'phros pas / klu rigs thams cad sbrul mgo bdun pa la sogs pa'am /
translated: Light shines from the letters in the heart of oneself abiding in the deity yoga.🔽All the nāga types are seven-headed snakes,

original: klu rigs sa bdag tu bsam /🔽'od zer lcags kyu dang zhags pa lta bus /
analyzed: klu rigs sa bdag tu bsam / 'od zer lcags kyu dang zhags pa lta bus /
translated: or the nāga types are imagined as bhūta spirits.

original: gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas pa nam mkha' dang sa gzhi thams cad nas bkug la /
analyzed: gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas pa nam mkha' dang sa gzhi thams cad nas bkug la /
translated: Light rays like hooks and lassos summon them from the four continents and Mount Meru, the sky, and the entire ground.

original: de'i lce la rdo rje bsam /
analyzed: de'i lce la rdo rje bsam /
translated: Imagine a vajra on their tongues.

original: de'i steng du h'um las 'od 'phros pas /
analyzed: de'i steng du h'um las 'od 'phros pas /
translated: Light rays shine from hūṃ above that.

original: 'od zer gyi sbu gus 'thungs /
analyzed: 'od zer gyi sbu gus 'thungs /
translated: They drink with a tube of light rays.

original: gnyis su med pa'i sems dang ldan par bsam /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i sems dang ldan par bsam /
translated: Imagine that they possess the nondual mind.

original: mchod pa lnga dang ldan pa la /
analyzed: mchod pa lnga dang ldan pa la /
translated: They are endowed with the five offerings.

original: aom ba ta li ma h'a ba ta li /
analyzed: aom ba ta li ma h'a ba ta li /
translated: oṃ bāṭali mahābāṭali

original: h'um h'um h'um /🔽dza:h'um bam ho:snyan gsan dbab pa'o //
analyzed: h'um h'um h'um / dza:h'um bam ho:snyan gsan dbab pa'o //
translated: hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ🔽jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ

original: aom bhu aa dhi pa ti ma h'a @79a * //
analyzed: aom bhu aa dhi pa ti ma h'a @79a * //
translated: oṃ bhu adhipati mahā

original: padma ; m'a le mri dza:a'a karsha ya dza:h'um bam ho:/
analyzed: padma ; m'a le mri dza:a'a karsha ya dza:h'um bam ho:/
translated: padma māle mṛjaḥ ākarṣaya jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ

original: aom ba ru na n'a ga de ba t'a /
analyzed: aom ba ru na n'a ga de ba t'a /
translated: oṃ varuṇa nāga deva tā

original: aom a'a karsha ya dza:h'um bam ho:/ aom a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha /🔽ma h'a n'a ga ho:ba ti sarba phu:phu:/🔽sa ma ya dza:h'um bam ho:/🔽me tog dbul /🔽aom bhaksha sa ma ya tishtha dza:h'um sv'a h'a /🔽'o ma la sogs dbul /🔽aom ba ru nan'a ga de ba t'a ye sv'a h'a /🔽aom n'a ga sarba phu:phu:aa nanta k'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom phu:phu:taksh'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom phu:phu:ba su ki ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a karsha ya dza:h'um bam ho:/ aom a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha / ma h'a n'a ga ho:ba ti sarba phu:phu:/ sa ma ya dza:h'um bam ho:/ me tog dbul / aom bhaksha sa ma ya tishtha dza:h'um sv'a h'a / 'o ma la sogs dbul / aom ba ru nan'a ga de ba t'a ye sv'a h'a / aom n'a ga sarba phu:phu:aa nanta k'a ya sv'a h'a / aom phu:phu:taksh'a ya sv'a h'a / aom phu:phu:ba su ki ye sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ, summon JAH HŪṃ VAḤ HOḤ.🔽Oṃ, summon, summon,🔽great nāga lord, all PHŪH PHŪH.🔽Samaya JAH HŪṃ VAḤ HOḤ.🔽Offer flowers.🔽Oṃ, enjoy, be firm in samaya, JAH HŪṃ SVĀHĀ.🔽Offer milk and so forth.🔽Oṃ, to Varuna, lord of the nāgas, SVĀHĀ.🔽Oṃ, to all nāgas, PHŪH PHŪH, to Ananta, SVĀHĀ.🔽Oṃ, PHŪH PHŪH, to Takṣaka, SVĀHĀ.🔽Oṃ, PHŪH PHŪH, to Vāsuki, SVĀHĀ.🔽

original: aom phu:phu:karko ta k'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom phu:phu: padm'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom phu:phu:ma h'a padm'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom phu:phu:sham kha p'a l'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom phu:phu:hu lu k'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom phu:phu:aa nanta sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /🔽aom n'a ga r'a dza aa nant'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom n'a ga sham kha p'a l'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom phu:phu:karko ta k'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom phu:phu: padm'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom phu:phu:ma h'a padm'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom phu:phu:sham kha p'a l'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom phu:phu:hu lu k'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom phu:phu:aa nanta sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /🔽aom n'a ga r'a dza aa nant'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom n'a ga sham kha p'a l'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ pū pū to the body of Karkoṭaka svāhā.🔽Oṃ pū pū to Padma svāhā.🔽Oṃ pū pū to Mahāpadma svāhā.🔽Oṃ pū pū to Śaṅkhapāla svāhā.🔽Oṃ pū pū to Huluhula svāhā.🔽Oṃ pū pū to Ananta, make peace svāhā.🔽Oṃ to Ananta, king of the nāgas, svāhā.🔽Oṃ to Śaṅkhapāla, king of the nāgas, svāhā.🔽

original: aom n'a ga sarba p'u dza me gha sa ma ye sv'a h'a /🔽aom n'a ga sarb ai dam lim grihna grihna sa ma ye sv'a h'a /🔽n'a ga hu lu k'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom n'a ga ba su ki ye sv'a h'a /🔽taksha ya sv'a h'a /🔽ba ta li sv'a h'a /🔽au pa nanda sv'a h'a ;🔽wa ru n'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom bi r'u pa ksha n'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom n'a le n'a ga le sv'a h'a /🔽aom n'a ga ke she phud ya te n'a ma ka pra marda n'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom bh'u aa dhi pa ti ma h'a padma m'a le mri dza /🔽ai dam ba lim grihna grihna pa ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom n'a ga sarba p'u dza me gha sa ma ye sv'a h'a / aom n'a ga sarb ai dam lim grihna grihna sa ma ye sv'a h'a / n'a ga hu lu k'a ya sv'a h'a / aom n'a ga ba su ki ye sv'a h'a / taksha ya sv'a h'a / ba ta li sv'a h'a / au pa nanda sv'a h'a ; wa ru n'a ya sv'a h'a / aom bi r'u pa ksha n'a ya sv'a h'a / aom n'a le n'a ga le sv'a h'a / aom n'a ga ke she phud ya te n'a ma ka pra marda n'a ya sv'a h'a / aom bh'u aa dhi pa ti ma h'a padma m'a le mri dza / ai dam ba lim grihna grihna pa ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ nāga sarva pūja megha samaye svāhā.🔽Oṃ nāga sarva idam lima gṛhaṇa gṛhaṇa samaye svāhā.🔽Nāga hulu kāya svāhā.🔽Oṃ nāga vasukiye svāhā.🔽Takṣaka svāhā.🔽Vatali svāhā.🔽Upananda svāhā.🔽Varuṇāya svāhā.🔽Oṃ virūpākṣāya svāhā.🔽Oṃ nāle nāgale svāhā.🔽Oṃ nāga keśe phud yate nāma kapramarḍanāya svāhā.🔽Oṃ bhū adhipati mahāpadma mālā mṛja.🔽Idam balim gṛhaṇa gṛhaṇa pāya svāhā.🔽

original: aom bh'u aa dhi pa ti ma h'a pa ra /🔽ma h'a padma ma lo mri dza /🔽ma h'a p'u dza sa ma ya sv'a h'a ;🔽sa bdag mchod pa /🔽klu shi sa bstan pa ni /🔽badzra pr'a ni n'a ga sh'ntim ku ru sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom bh'u aa dhi pa ti ma h'a pa ra /🔽ma h'a padma ma lo mri dza /🔽ma h'a p'u dza sa ma ya sv'a h'a ;🔽sa bdag mchod pa /🔽klu shi sa bstan pa ni /🔽badzra pr'a ni n'a ga sh'ntim ku ru sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ bhū adhipati mahāpāra🔽mahāpadma malomṛja🔽mahāpūja samaya svāhā.🔽This is the offering to the lords of the earth.🔽The teaching on the nāgas’ death is:🔽vajra-prani nāga śāntim kuru svāhā.🔽

original: stong bzlas na sa bdag klu gnyan kha 'ching bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong bzlas na sa bdag klu gnyan kha 'ching bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If you recite it one hundred times, it will bind the mouths of the nāga spirits of the earth.

original: zab che chung blta /
analyzed: zab che chung blta /
translated: Look at the depth and size of the hole.

original: zab che na gzugs sna tshogs bya ba bar bar du sha dang nya sha dang / chu mig nas chu blangs la ba dmar ser gyi'o mas bya /
analyzed: zab che na gzugs sna tshogs bya ba bar bar du sha dang nya sha dang / chu mig nas chu blangs la ba dmar ser gyi'o mas bya /
translated: If it is deep and large, you should fill it with various forms, fish, and meat, and water from a spring, and mix it with the milk of a reddish-brown cow.

original: chung na gtor mas chog / bya khyung sa ma ya tantr'i rgyud las btus pa /
analyzed: chung na gtor mas chog / bya khyung sa ma ya tantr'i rgyud las btus pa /
translated: If it is small, it is sufficient to fill it with torma.🔽This concludes the extensive nāga torma extracted from the Garuḍa Tantra.

original: lo ts'a ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'i klu gtor rgyas pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: lo ts'a ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'i klu gtor rgyas pa rdzogs so//
translated: It was translated by the translator Glang Chung Dar Ma Tshul Khrims.
